name: anatosaurus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a former name for a type of dinosaur that had a wide beak like a duck: The anatosaurus was a bipedal duck-billed dinosaur of the Late Cretaceous Period.
More examplesFewer examplesAnatosaurus was named by Lull and Wright in 1942.The drawing shows an anatosaurus.Anatosaurus was a herbivore; it probably ate mostly conifer needles and seeds.Anatosaurus had a long tail, short arms and a very long, flat skull.
